message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $15,000. I think it would be very valuable for you, and this is a great deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to both of us.
